name: Genshin Rhythm
description:
This is a free, fan-made game.

This is a pre-alpha mini-game that will showcase Genshin Impact Rhythm Game that is coming with the Patch 1.4 Windblume Festival.

Youtube | Discord

Version:

0.0.5

Y U Mek Dis Gaem?

I develop this game when waiting for my resins to regenerate.

This game gud?

This game is not that great. There is only 1 song in the game right now as I'm not too sure how many people are interested in this.

Are You miHoYo Staff?

No, I am not. This is a 100% fan-made game. No one from miHoYo is involved in the development of this game. All the assets used are only for education purpose (not-for-profit) and provide some content for the Genshin Impact community while waiting for them to release new content.

I only distribute this game on itch.io and I will immediately remove this game if miHoYo ever ask me to stop distributing this game on this platform.
